Package it.polimi.ingsw.server.answers

Interface Answer

All Superinterfaces:
Serializable
All Known Subinterfaces:
ModelMessage
All Known Implementing Classes:
BalanceMessage, CharactersMessage, CloudsMessage, ConnectionMessage, CustomMessage, GameError, GameStateMessage, HandMessage, IslandsMessage, MagicianMessage, ModeMessage, MotherMessage, PingMessage, PlayedCardMessage, PlayersStatusMessage, ProfsMessage, ReqMagicianMessage, ReqPlayersMessage, RoundOwnerMessage, SchoolMessage, WinMessage
public interface Answer extends Serializable
Answer class defines an interface for server answers. It's implemented by several messages, which represent a specific type of communication that the server would have with the client.
See Also:
